column3: I'm not sure I like that - it makes code more readable to have the default listed explicitly, imho.\n
I just tried to harmonize the code once more, perhaps we should stop defining the default for GetBoolArg() then, which means we HAVE to specify what we want as default.\n

I agree with Sipa. Explicit is better in this case, and it's not like `, false` adds a lot of ugly code. Personally I'd be  fine with removing the default argument and specifying the default value on all GetBoolArg.\n
@laanwj @sipa Updated and removed the default for fDefault paramter.\n
Updated to include missing changes to util_tests.cpp.\n
Reverted some changes, that led to wrong testnet detection because of init order (fTestNet).\n

Don't merge yet, seems fTestNet is not yet set, when reaching this ;).\n
For the usage in StartRPCThreads this is ok (testnet is parsed way before calling StartRPCThreads), but in the CommandLineRPC case this is incorrect, as fTestNet is never set.\n
Good catch, I'll revert this change!\n
Try to keep these kind of changes in unrelated functions out of your commits. This makes it harder to determine what actually changed.\n
